title: Privacy Policy
content:
This is the privacy policy of ROOTTEAM, Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "our company"). Please review and agree to the terms of this privacy policy when using our various services.

Acquisition of Personal Information

Our company collects personal information from users of our services in the following ways:

Directly receiving personal information from users

Automatically recording personal information when users use our services

Purpose of Using Personal Information

We use personal information for the following purposes:

Operation of our services (including services under registration) and communication and information provision associated with it

Measures against fraud necessary for the safe operation of our services

Improvement and new development of our services

Proposing various services, providing information, and delivering advertisements to users

Surveys, analysis, and marketing necessary for each of the above purposes

Outsourcing of Personal Information Processing

We may outsource all or part of the personal information processing operations. In this case, we will supervise the subcontractor as necessary and appropriate.

For measuring advertising effectiveness, our site may obtain information about advertisements clicked before visiting our site from third-party tools and match it with your registration information.

Requests for Disclosure of Personal Information, etc.

The user or their agent can request the disclosure, correction, addition, deletion, suspension of use, or deletion of personal information that identifies the user, and notification of the purpose of use, according to our company's procedures.

For specific procedures, please contact the inquiry point for personal information stated in this privacy policy.

Service Provision When Personal Information Is Not Provided

If the user does not provide the personal information specified by each of our services, we may not be able to provide all or part of our services.

Personal Information Management Supervisor

Hiroki Sawai, Representative Director, ROOTTEAM, Inc.

Contact for Personal Information Inquiries

Telephone number: 0368975928

Established August 1, 2021
